ninja.validation

Interface Validator<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Validators.FloatValidator, Validators.IntegerValidator, Validators.JSRValidator, Validators.LengthValidator, Validators.MatchesValidator, Validators.NumberValidator, Validators.RequiredValidator

    public interface Validator<T>
    A validator for validating parameters
    Author:
    James Roper
